mapper.update: update t_impawn_info set Cust_id = #{custId,jdbcType=CHAR}, Agency_id = #{agencyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, Pawn_goods_name = #{pawnGoodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Pawn_goods_num = #{pawnGoodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Contract_date = #{contractDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Borrow_id = #{borrowId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select Borrow_id, Cust_id, Agency_id, Pawn_goods_name, Pawn_goods_num, Contract_date from t_impawn_info
